ygData.subject: Re: MM Castle Tour was: Gypsy Lute
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah, that s not a classic castle train.  A classic castle train is the stairway gargoyles (2), mobs before the ballroom (4), mobs in the alcoves to the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 15 Feb 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> After about an hour maybe not quite, the path and most of the castle was
> cleared. Groups started moving in and camping rooms. Pretty soon, there was
> a shortage of stuff to pull. Well, kind of a shortage. One SK goes "can I
> pull the rest of the castle here?" (We were in the main foyer/ballroom?)
> Hehe, since nobody screamed "OMG NO!!!!" He did. We had a castle pull -
> classic MM style. There were by later count 17 mobs pulled into the melee.

Bah, that's not a classic castle train. A classic castle
train is the stairway gargoyles (2), mobs before the ballroom
(4), mobs in the alcoves to the left and right of the ballroom
(5), mobs in the upper level of the ballroom (4), gypsies in
the ballroom (4), gargoyles behind the negotiator room (4)
mobs in the negotiator room (6 or 7), and anything that's on
the plateau and castle entrance (8). That's 37 mobs, plus
pets. If the pit isn't camped, add in 5 more by the time the
train reaches the zone.

> Sylly SongSynger
> Bardette of 46 songs

You've caught up to me. :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
